languages.text: "Самовлюбленной, беспринципной и независимой стервой, которая лгала всем и каждому. Признаюсь, я тогда пожалел{mf||а}, что не успел{mf||а} узнать ее получше... Я принял{mf||а} ее принципы и узрел{mf||а}, что абсолютно каждый в Просторе пытается меня использовать к своей выгоде. Друзианцы и пираты, Механикус и Касбаллика, Калькасар и Уралон... И вместо того, чтобы быть куклой в их руках, я стал{mf||а} ими манипулировать. И у меня неплохо получилось".

"A narcissistic, unscrupulous, self-serving bitch who lied to everyone. I admit I regretted not getting the chance to know her better... I embraced her principles and realised that literally everyone in the Koronus Expanse was out to take advantage of me. The Drusians and the pirates, the Adeptus Mechanicus and the Kasballica, Calcazar and Uralon... And so the puppet pulled at the strings and made its masters dance. I dare say things turned out well for me."
languages.original_text: "Самовлюбленной, беспринципной и независимой стервой, которая лгала всем и каждому. Признаюсь, я тогда пожалел{mf||а}, что не успел{mf||а} узнать ее получше... Я принял{mf||а} ее принципы и узрел{mf||а}, что абсолютно каждый в Просторе пытается меня использовать к своей выгоде. Друзианцы и пираты, Механикус и Касбаллика, Калькасар и Уралон... И вместо того, чтобы быть куклой в их руках, я стал{mf||а} ими манипулировать. И у меня неплохо получилось".

traits.locale_text: "A narcissistic, unscrupulous and self-serving bitch who lied to everyone. I admit I regretted not having had the time to know her better... I embraced her principles and realized that literally everyone in the Koronus Expanse sought to take advantage of me. Drusians and pirates, Mechanicus and Kasballica, Calcazar and Uralon... And so the puppet pulled at the strings and made its masters dance. I dare say it went well."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: « C'était une garce narcissique, cupide et sans scrupules qui mentait à tout le monde. J'admets que j'ai regretté de ne pas avoir eu l'occasion de mieux la connaître... J'ai adopté ses principes et réalisé que tout le monde dans les Étendues de Koronus cherchait à profiter de moi. Les Drusiens et les pirates, l'Adeptus Mechanicus et la Kasballica, Calcazar et Uralon... Alors, la marionnette a décidé de tirer elle-même les ficelles et de faire danser ses maîtres. Je dois dire que je m'en suis plutôt bien sorti. »
languages.original_text: "A narcissistic, unscrupulous, self-serving bitch who lied to everyone. I admit I regretted not getting the chance to know her better... I embraced her principles and realised that literally everyone in the Koronus Expanse was out to take advantage of me. The Drusians and the pirates, the Adeptus Mechanicus and the Kasballica, Calcazar and Uralon... And so the puppet pulled at the strings and made its masters dance. I dare say things turned out well for me."

traits.locale_text: « C'était une garce narcissique, cupide et sans scrupules qui mentait à tout le monde. J'admets que j'ai regretté de ne pas avoir eu le temps de mieux la connaître... J'ai adopté ses principes et réalisé que tout le monde dans les Étendues de Koronus cherchait à profiter de moi. Les Drusiens et les pirates, le Mechanicus et la Kasballica, Calcazar et Uralon... Alors la marionnette a décidé de tirer elle-même les ficelles et de faire danser ses maîtres. Je dois dire que ça s'est plutôt bien passé. »
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: «Una furcia narcisista egocéntrica sin escrúpulos que le mentía a todo el mundo. Admito que lamento no haber tenido ocasión de conocerla mejor... Acepté sus principios y me di cuenta de que todo el mundo en la Extensión de Koronus quería aprovecharse de mí. Los drusianos y los piratas, el Adeptus Mechanicus y la Kasballica, Calcazar y Uralon... Así que esta marioneta hizo que sus titiriteros bailaran a su son. En mi opinión, me fue bastante bien».
languages.original_text: "A narcissistic, unscrupulous, self-serving bitch who lied to everyone. I admit I regretted not getting the chance to know her better... I embraced her principles and realised that literally everyone in the Koronus Expanse was out to take advantage of me. The Drusians and the pirates, the Adeptus Mechanicus and the Kasballica, Calcazar and Uralon... And so the puppet pulled at the strings and made its masters dance. I dare say things turned out well for me."

traits.locale_text: «Una furcia narcisista egocéntrica sin escrúpulos que le mentía a todo el mundo. Admito que lamento no haberla conocido mejor... Así que esta marioneta hizo que sus titiriteros bailaran a su son. En mi opinión, me fue bastante bien».
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: “那个自私自利的臭婊子、自恋狂，她对所有人都撒了谎。我得承认我很遗憾，要是我有机会多了解了解她就好了……我继承了她的行事风格。我也意识到，整个科罗努斯扩区，几乎所有人都打算从我这里分一杯羹，无论是德鲁苏斯教派还是海盗，机械修会还是卡斯巴利卡，卡尔卡扎还是乌拉隆……于是，木偶拖着身上的绳子，逼所有牵线的人跳起了舞。我可以说，事情进展得相当顺利。”
languages.original_text: "A narcissistic, unscrupulous, self-serving bitch who lied to everyone. I admit I regretted not getting the chance to know her better... I embraced her principles and realised that literally everyone in the Koronus Expanse was out to take advantage of me. The Drusians and the pirates, the Adeptus Mechanicus and the Kasballica, Calcazar and Uralon... And so the puppet pulled at the strings and made its masters dance. I dare say things turned out well for me."

traits.locale_text: “那个自私自利的臭婊子、自恋狂，她对所有人都撒了谎。我得承认我很遗憾，要是我能多了解了解她就好了……我继承了她的行事风格。我也意识到，整个科罗努斯扩区，几乎所有人都打算从我这里分一杯羹，无论是德鲁苏斯教派还是海盗，机械修会还是卡斯巴利卡，卡尔卡扎还是乌拉隆……于是，木偶拖着身上的绳子，逼所有牵线的人跳起了舞。我可以说，事情进展得相当顺利。”
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: 「ナルシストで、不謹慎で、誰にでも嘘をつく利己的な女狐だ。彼女をもっとよく知る時間がなかったことを後悔しているよ…私は彼女の原則を受け入れ、文字通りコロヌス・エクスパンスの誰もが私を利用しようとしていることに気づいた。ドルシアンや海賊、帝国技術局やカスバリカ、カルカサルにウラロン…そうして操り人形は糸を引き、主人を踊らせたわけだ。強いて言えば、いい結果になった」
languages.original_text: "A narcissistic, unscrupulous, self-serving bitch who lied to everyone. I admit I regretted not getting the chance to know her better... I embraced her principles and realised that literally everyone in the Koronus Expanse was out to take advantage of me. The Drusians and the pirates, the Adeptus Mechanicus and the Kasballica, Calcazar and Uralon... And so the puppet pulled at the strings and made its masters dance. I dare say things turned out well for me."

traits.locale_text: 「ナルシストで、不謹慎で、誰にでも嘘をつく利己的な女狐だ。彼女をもっとよく知る時間がなかったことを後悔しているよ…私は彼女の原則を受け入れ、文字通りコロヌス・エクスパンスの誰もが私を利用しようとしていることに気づいた。ドルシアンや海賊、帝国技術局やカスバリカ、カルカサルにウラロン…そうして操り人形は糸を引き、主人を踊らせたわけだ。強いて言えば、いい結果になった」
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Eine narzisstische, skrupellose und selbstsüchtige Hure, die alle belogen hat. Ich muss gestehen, ich bedauere es, dass ich sie nicht besser kennenlernen konnte ... Ich habe ihre Prinzipien vollständig angenommen und erkannt, dass buchstäblich jeder in der Koronus-Ausdehnung mich ausnutzen wollte. Drusianer und Piraten, Adeptus Mechanicus und Kasballica, Calcazar und Uralon ... Und so zog die Marionette die Strippen und ließ ihre Meister tanzen. Ich muss sagen, es ist alles recht gut gelaufen für mich."
languages.original_text: "A narcissistic, unscrupulous, self-serving bitch who lied to everyone. I admit I regretted not getting the chance to know her better... I embraced her principles and realised that literally everyone in the Koronus Expanse was out to take advantage of me. The Drusians and the pirates, the Adeptus Mechanicus and the Kasballica, Calcazar and Uralon... And so the puppet pulled at the strings and made its masters dance. I dare say things turned out well for me."

traits.locale_text: "Eine narzisstische, skrupellose und selbstsüchtige Hure, die alle belogen hat. Ich muss gestehen, ich bedauere es, dass ich sie nicht besser kennenlernen konnte ... Ich habe ihre Prinzipien vollständig angenommen und erkannt, dass buchstäblich jeder in der Koronus-Ausdehnung mich ausnutzen wollte. Drusianer und Piraten, Mechanicus und Kasballica, Calcazar und Uralon ... Und so zog die Marionette die Strippen und ließ ihre Meister tanzen. Ich muss sagen, es lief gut."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Narsist, vicdansız, herkese yalan söyleyen, bencil bir kahpeymiş. Onu daha iyi tanıyamadığım için pişman olduğumu itiraf edebilirim... Onun ilkelerini benimsedim ve Koronus Enginliği'nde tanıdığım herkesin benden yararlanmaya çalıştığını fark ettim. Drususçular ve korsanlar, Adeptus Mechanicus ve Kasballica, Calcazar ve Uralon... İşte o zaman kukla uyandı ve efendisinin iplerini eline aldı. İşlerim tıkırında gitti diyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "A narcissistic, unscrupulous, self-serving bitch who lied to everyone. I admit I regretted not getting the chance to know her better... I embraced her principles and realised that literally everyone in the Koronus Expanse was out to take advantage of me. The Drusians and the pirates, the Adeptus Mechanicus and the Kasballica, Calcazar and Uralon... And so the puppet pulled at the strings and made its masters dance. I dare say things turned out well for me."
